short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grabs your input in Chat-GPT using the up arrow. Increases productivity by reducing the need to highlight and copy paste text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing gptUpGrab, a powerful Chrome extension that enhances your GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) conversation experience by enabling seamless message selection using just the up and down arrow keys. With gptUpGrab running discreetly in the background, you can easily navigate through previous messages in GPT conversations without any user interface distractions.

Using this extension is as simple as 1-2-3: download gptUpGrab, reload your GPT chat page, and you're ready to go. Gone are the days of manually scrolling through lengthy chat logs to find that specific message you need. With gptUpGrab, effortlessly select and reference previous inputs and responses for improved efficiency and productivity.
